Articles.Content:
Hello, I am still new but i have been playing sence 0.18 here are some of my aircraft that work with FAR too! (the mods are listed in the readme in the download and here too)

You can also share spacecraft/aircraft here too!

--------------------------------------------------------MODS---------------------------------------------------------------

* for required

| for optional

*Tv aerospace

*Firespitter Pack

*B9 aerospace (says 0.22 but it works with 0.23.5)

*Procedual wings

|Ferram Aerospace Research

|Mk2 Cockpit IVA

---------------------------------------------------Aircraft-------------------------------------------------------------

Planned:

Minijet Fighter Series

Minijet Helicopter Series

Minijet Seacraft Series

Minijet Mk1

Minijet Mk2

Minijet Mk3

i need a screenshot hold on

Minijet Mk4

Minijet Mk5

Minijet Mk6

Minijet Mk7

Minijet Passenger Mk1

Minijet Passenger Mk2

Minijet Passenger Mk3

Minijet Passenger Mk4

i need a screenshot hold on

Minijet Passenger Mk5

The Download --> https://www.dropbox.com/sh/zvns6eq97sp7t3w/AAC7PJuA7QSv2bkohXfCmQ52a

(The reason they are called minijet is because i want my own type of aircraft with the brand name Minijet)

Be sure to leave feedback and Share your aircraft with me (must have the mods listed in the readme or stock)

-Mike_Kerm 2014 Minijet Co 2014

Edited May 30, 2014 by Mike_Kerm
Those are some nice designs Mike. Could you mention which mods you're using in the thread instead of the readme of the download file?
Oh i didnt think about that! I will update the thread.
